1: Despite having limited resources, the organization managed to deliver essential services to the community effectively.
(1) The organization failed to provide services to the community because of insufficient resources.
(2) The organization chose not to assist the community due to a lack of resources.
(3) The organization had an abundance of resources and could not deliver services to the community.
(4) Even with few resources, the organization was able to offer vital services to the community successfully.
2: تشير الجملة إلى أن المنظمة تمكنت من تقديم خدمات أساسية على الرغم من الموارد المحدودة.
3: (2) غير صحيح، يتحدث عن عدم المساعدة.
(3) غير صحيح، يتحدث عن وجود وفرة من الموارد.
